actives.name: Aibe seed
actives.description: Dandelion-like flower whose seeds blow off on approach and affect intruders.

actives.name: Che plat nut
actives.description: Inanimate flowering vine with very many very thin white petals

actives.name: Dabano berry
actives.description: Inanimate vine with dark blue flowers and darker berries.

actives.name: Inha berry
actives.description: Non-aggressive, with purple flowers and berries.

actives.name: Lover's kiss flower
actives.description: Has orange flowers; twines around victims and locks them in enchanted sleep. (Soporific 1: take 1 Fatigue per hit.)

actives.name: Merflower petal
actives.description: Water lily with black and white petals

actives.name: Mie laz flower
actives.description: With yellow flowers with contact toxin effect.

actives.name: Nejal berry
actives.description: Bush like strawberry, small and red.

actives.name: Tebac petal
actives.description: Oxalis-like flower with red petals. Instead of inflicting Injury if taken raw, causes addiction.

actives.name: Vichas flower
actives.description: With black flowers and a contact neurotoxin.

actives.name: Wrath lily petal
actives.description: Scarlet flowers with large stamens that burst on approach, releasing wrath pollen.

ampers.name: Aokla
ampers.description: A fern that can be ingested directly and is a mild euphoriant

ampers.name: Blast pod leaf
ampers.description: A pod that fills with something pressurised and explosive that goes off on contact. Farmed by kaiju as a cheap trap.

ampers.name: Chokeweed leaf
ampers.description: Animate vines. No special abilities, but it grows very profusely.

ampers.name: Dash corn
ampers.description: Much like maize, except that its ears grow absurdly fast (eg one per day); however, they rot just as fast. Farmed by kaiju as sustenance for minions.

ampers.name: Firelace
ampers.description: pink flowers that burst into flame on contact. Farmed by kaiju as a cheap trap.

ampers.name: Kaicheri leaf
ampers.description: Unaggressive, with broad leaves and small white flowers

ampers.name: Maiden's touch
ampers.description: Unaggressive seaweed with long tendrils that drain magic on touch.

dampers.name: Blue cap
dampers.description: A mushroom with blue spots; quite toxic unless boiled.

dampers.name: Inzun
dampers.description: With yellow flowers that grow into red berries. The vines drain ability to use magic.

dampers.name: Glueshroom
dampers.colors: OY: a mushroom that secretes a powerful adhesive when squeezed

dampers.name: Hezucoral
dampers.description: Plant that accretes minerals out of water and creates semi-mineral structural matrices. The foundation of most aquatic nexi; needs nexus magic to grow effectively.

dampers.name: Horizon mushroom
dampers.description: An extremely fast-growing mushroom that's quite nutritious.

dampers.name: Noi wan
dampers.description: A toadstool that twists gravity when stepped on; fully grown ones can launch a person into the air. Farmed by kaiju as low-effort ladders.

dampers.name: Pora stalk
dampers.description: A toadstool that's quite poisonous without an active ingredient.

dampers.name: Scarlet cap
dampers.description: A mushroom with a pure red top

dampers.name: Vampire bramble root
dampers.description: With thorns that inflict Bleeding on any hit.

dampers.name: Yunzo root
dampers.description: Grassy weed much like that stuff Fang said she made dumplings out of.

preservatives.name: Crabweed sap
preservatives.description: With bright pink flowers; grabs its victims' ankles and holds them there

preservatives.name: Honeycup honey
preservatives.description: A flower that rapidly produces a cupful of honey.

preservatives.name: Kobal sap
preservatives.description: A tree whose (mundane) fruit grows absurdly quickly

preservatives.name: Modaga sap
preservatives.description: A cactus-like plant. The sap is mildly hallucinogenic by itself.

preservatives.name: Nezema resin
preservatives.description: With broad leaves that secretes a very sticky resin that's an absolute bitch to get off.

preservatives.name: Shaika
preservatives.description: A tree that grows fruits of many neighbouring species ("At least one of them has to work, right?").

preservatives.name: Stone root
preservatives.description: A plant that incorporates rock into its structural matrix. Very tough, used by kaiju to build stuff. Uses a mixture of minerals: quartz, calcite, aragonite, hydroxyapatite, etc. Other plants grow in cracks, making it more of a biocomposite matrix.
